mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( paymentId , purchaseId , amount , currency , shopId , account , loyaltyType , purchaseAmount , feeAmount , totalAmount , paymentStatus ) VALUES ( #{paymentId}, #{purchaseId}, #{amount}, #{currency}, #{shopId}, #{account}, ${loyaltyType}, #{purchaseAmount}, #{feeAmount}, #{totalAmount}, ${paymentStatus} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE purchaseId = VALUES(purchaseId), amount = VALUES(amount), currency = VALUES(currency), shopId = VALUES(shopId), account = VALUES(account), loyaltyType = VALUES(loyaltyType), purchaseAmount = VALUES(purchaseAmount), feeAmount = VALUES(feeAmount), totalAmount = VALUES(totalAmount), paymentStatus = VALUES(paymentStatus);
